website_summaries.verdict: This is a roomy backpack that's a great value for students and professionals.
pros: Insulated front pocket and roomy organizer pocket
Sternum strap to distribute weight when the bag is heavy for improved comfort
cons: Some feel the 2 front compartments are on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Why did they change the zipper on the lowest compartment?
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dakine backpack. I have many backpacks over the years, including ome like Tumi that are very expensive. However the Dakine outlasted all my previous backpacks. I love the layout of the compartments and the roomy main compartment. However, I am soooooo disappointed that they changed the the zipper on the lowest compartment to a single zipper rather than the double zipper. It is difficult to get into without everything falling out and I have to keep re-zipping it because the zipper moves from the fully closed position on its own. I no longer put anything I truly care about in that compartment because I am afraid of losing anything out of it. PLEASE CHANGE IT BACK!
customer_reviews.author: Erica L. Downer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Dakine Pack. You can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Dakine backpacks for over a decade. I purchased this for my son who just started college. I have two Dakine packs that lasted me through college ( I went to college later in life) and I still use for work and travel. My sister still has hers from college as well. Now that my own kids are starting college, there is only one brand I thought of...Dakine. Priced well, well built, and everlasting, my son loves this pack. Due to my experience, I believe it will last him for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: redheadmed

customer_reviews.title: Great work backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble finding a smaller light weight backpack. This was perfect. It loves my MacBook Pro, has plenty of room for my notebook, rain jacket, and big headphones, with room to spare for travel. I never knew I needed the cooler pouch, but it’s great for bringing a cold can to work. The water bottle pockets fit my water bottle and coffee mug great. Zippers and straps are all very sturdy, especially for the price. Plus it doesn’t look rediculius on a 35 year old IT worker. This has been my favorite bag out of the ones I’ve owned over the past 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Messmore

customer_reviews.title: Okay backpack for the price
customer_reviews.text: Original: Excellent backpack for a low price (check all the colors). I use it every day to carry things to and from the office and it's still as good as new after about four months. Update: Well, sometime after four months, the fabric on the bottom wore down and holes appeared. The material is just not strong enough to resist damage from abrasion -- however slight. Also, I wouldn't recommend any backpack with open elastic side pockets and as little structural support/rigidity as this has. It's really hard to find something decent -- I replaced this with a Samsonite Cityscape, which is much more expensive, but for something cheaper, look for a Tigernu design that seems functionally useful.
customer_reviews.author: Centrist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pump & Supplies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for work. It easily holds my Medela pump, and lunch bag with ice packs and bottles. I use the front insulated pocket to hold the flanges and tubes, and the other pocket holds my sanitizer, vitamins, snacks, etc. It is seriously perfect. I might not use it for work once I'm done pumping because it's so big; it would be perfect for a student or for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Melee

customer_reviews.title: Nice size pack if you don't need to carry a ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it was smaller and different colored than I expected. Nice size pack if you don't need to carry a lot, but with my small laptop and a couple notebooks, I wouldn't have room for a jacket or extra things like I sometimes need. I thought the color would be a neutral gray oxford look but it's kind of blue-toned and looked too much like denim for my liking. I also would rather have a regular pocket than an insulated one in front. Just preferences, nothing actually wrong with the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Linsey Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Durable backpack
customer_reviews.text: We love Dakine backpacks. They are durable! My son used his first Dakine for three years and it was still life left but he wanted the new bigger one for middle school. It is larger than 25l just enough for a few extra books. We were hoping that the color is going to be the same as pictured but it’s not. The white stripes are actually not white they are more off white. I will attach the photo.
customer_reviews.author: VR011

customer_reviews.title: Most Spacious and Comfy Backpack Ever
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is exactly what I need as a college student. Two side pockets for easy access to my water bottle or wallet, tons of compartments, and crazy spacious as well. i can fit my laptop, four notebook, textbooks, and 3 regular sized books, and still have room on top to stuff my jacket in. It's also the comfiest backpack ever, even when its super heavy it doesnt hurt my back because of the way the straps fit and the ergonomic shape of it. its real cool looking too, ive gotten compliments. definitely worth the $55
customer_reviews.author: Liet

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Brought 3 different color patterns of the same backpack. We liked them all. Holds a 17 inch laptop in laptop pouch. Plus a bunch of books and binders. The smaller pouches hold a variety of things. No problems with any of the backpacks. We have had dakine backpacks in the past and they all held up very well with daily use by elementary/middle school age boys. Plus used for snowboarding, camping, travel, gym, other various sports. Dakine backpacks have never failed us.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Perfect, well thought-out compartments. It’s smaller than I expected, but the brand is very clear about sizing- just pay attention and get a bigger size if that’s appropriate to your needs. The insulated front pocket is far too small for an actual lunch, but it is perfect for a snack or what I use it for: calculator protection. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette A Murray

customer_reviews.title: I could probably carry my dog in here
customer_reviews.text: Used this backpack for college and now it's over 3.5 years old. It still looks brand new. Good quality backpack with a lot of nifty features like the laptop pouch and the insulated front pocket. It's always been able to hold everything I need and the straps disperse the weight a bit so it doesn't start cutting into your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Steff W

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy another brand because I have had such good quality bags over the years and Da Kine never ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 6 Da Kine backpacks over the past 17 years. I will not buy another brand because I have had such good quality bags over the years and Da Kine never let me down! This is my 4th Campus backpack and by far the worst quality bag I have ever purchased from Da Kine. The material and stitching feels and looks cheap. I purchased the 25L black bag. My previous bag was the 33L grey and was well constructed and lasted 4 years of everyday use. I know this is one of the least expensive Da Kine bags but it shouldn't mean it should lack in quality. If I could return it at this point would.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Caramnico

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this year for my daughter to carry her laptop to school and wherever. Quality seems to be great and bag is holding up without any issues at all. And this particular child is pretty hard on things, so happy with the quality and it has all the compartments, etc that she needs for all of her school stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio N8tive 68

customer_reviews.title: An amazing backpack
customer_reviews.text: An amazing backpack. Carried my 17 inch laptop, one (sometimes two) large law casebooks, and my breakfast, lunch and dinner, a water bottle and my umbrella when needed. The straps were comfy and didn't dig in. The chest strap is adjustable so it didn't squish my boobs in a weird way. I like the sunglasses case but I used it to hold my cell instead.
customer_reviews.author: G&KTripleA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these backpacks. These are the only backpacks I will buy for my family. Mine, I have traveled with and it's still going strong. My kids use them for school and I buy one every few years. We tried another brand last year for my youngest son and it fell apart in months. We replaced it with this Dakine bag and he loves it. The pockets are perfect, easy to organize and sturdy. Thank you Dakine!
customer_reviews.author: Z. L.

customer_reviews.title: BEST Backpack for High Schooler
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has held up EXTREMELY well. My daughter has the heaviest of books to lug back and forth from school on a daily basis and this backpack serves it's purpose and more. PLENTY of roomy, zippered compartments. There's space for a water bottle, pencil case, wallet, phone and teenage knick knacks galore! With high school books that rival college level texts, she's able to carry 4 to 5 subjects at all times and because the straps are specially designed for comfort, she's not bent over front the excessive weight. A DEFINITE plus when it comes to carrying a heavy load.
customer_reviews.author: Tuned In, Turned Up

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE FOR A STUDENT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT bookbag! I am a 1st year nursing student and require a bookbag that will carry multiple binders and books! I originally had a NORTHFACE Vault bookbag and it was too small. This fits everything perfectly and still has room! The insulated pocket is also great for snacks on my long school days where I don’t have time to get a real meal in. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is in school!
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Quality, lots of pockets and space, durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag in 2017 for my boyfriend and it has lasted for the last 4 years. It was well used, daily, and recently the zipper broke. The bag has been to hell and back so I'm surprised it lasted so long. Very sturdy and durable. Lots of pockets and can fit a lot of stuff inside. He even used it as a tool bag at one point. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: LeiC233

customer_reviews.title: Dakine is great, but some materials are thin here.
customer_reviews.text: Another great Dakine backpack. I still wish some better materials were used but I'm not sure if those are reserved for higher price points. I like thick, soft materials that you don't necessarily "feel" on your back and that hug the contents well. The straps are decent here and the lining is okay, just wish it had a bit more cushion overall considering it has a laptop sleeve and I barely feel comfortable transporting my laptop in it.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly shoddy construction
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and fits laptop etc very nicely but surprisingly shoddy construction! Part of a seam started coming undone after only a month. Have owned several Dakine bags in the past they all lasted very wekk. Makes me wonder if what Amazon is selling here is really a knock-off bag??
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Can't beat Dakine backpacks
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Can't beat Dakine backpacks. Love the cooler pocket, which is pretty much the main reason I bought it. Had a dakine pack with the cooler pocket that I got years ago and it was great, but I forgot about a sandwich I had in the pocket, and we'll, the fruit flies got to it, and there were maggots galore in my pack. Had to throw it away :( So, I'm stoked to have another dakine. Super fast shipping - arrived earlier than expected. The seller was great with communication.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki B

customer_reviews.title: This might be the greatest back pack I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I love this back pack. It is the perfect size and shape. It is light weight and made very well. The zippers are strong and durable and close super smooth. This might be the greatest back pack I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: GREAT back pack
customer_reviews.text: GREAT back pack. My 8th grader is very hard on his packpack and this one will last him for sure. Strong material and plenty of pockets and room for all his books. I love the front "cool" zipper pouch too. I only wish they made one with colors more for girls and I would buy one for my daughter too. She deemed these all "for boys". lol
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Dakine backpack and a matching piece of Dakine luggage about 5 years ago. Both have served me well. I wanted another backpack, with the chest strap, for hiking and festivals. This one is perfect. Sturdy, attractive and functional. I keep recommending these to my friends and family, since they borrow mine often. They hold up well with use, and continue to look good.
customer_reviews.author: Starrbyrd

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: The color is amazing. I love the design of this bag. Much attention to detail. The pockets are very convenient. I use this for my motorcycle and to take to work. I love the cooler pocket in the front and sunglasses pocket. They really did think of everything! Would buy it again 100 times.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B.

customer_reviews.title: fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: MY daughter absolutely loved this bag. She is in college and has several (can you say more than 10 books) besides all the other stuff she needs to carry. This bag also has a lunch bag which keeps everything nice and cold. There are less expensive bags like this one but we opted for this one because she liked the colors. It was well worth the price to see her happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie H.

customer_reviews.title: Dakine is no ka 'oi
customer_reviews.text: Dakine is awesome. Dakine is my favorite pack brand. Cool look, solid contraction, doesn't weigh a lot. I don't like a heavy pack and this one has a cooler pocket in front. I put a frozen drink or an icepack with a small wash cloth to absorb moisture. Then i can use the small wash cloth to wipe my grimey face after i eat.
customer_reviews.author: Makaua

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack with some small pockets
customer_reviews.text: The main storage has plenty of room for storage, including space for save storage of your computer, you can even pack some overnight clothes in it for travel. The first front pocket worked nicely as a cooler. The other two front pocket is small and shallow, they do not go to the bottom of the bag, the depth only go to where the zipper for the next pocket begins. Otherwise, it is a nice and durable backpack.
customer_reviews.author: CKE

customer_reviews.title: The top of the straps/handle makes it painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time on campus and bought this backpack mainly for the cooling compartment pocket - which does not work. Even with an icepack in the pocket, my food was fairly warm before two hours was up. The top of the straps/handle makes it painful to wear. After about a week of wearing it I returned it because of the back pain. Obviously, not everone has this problem and other than those two factors, it is a nice backback with great pocket organization.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for students who otherwise can't afford. They aren't reinforced at bottom so within months of dragging under desk to pull closer to open they look worn and are being to fray. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schwab

customer_reviews.title: I've been searching for a backpack like this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BACKPACK! I've been looking for a new one with the same type of pockets from Dakine (i had an old one from like 8 years ago with the same front cooler pack/pocket and it's perfect! I use it as a gym bag/laptop/daily backpack and then put my lunch in the front cooler
customer_reviews.author: SSummer86

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: Typically I carry my laptop, two notebooks, calculator, lots of pens, snacks, waterbottle (x2), and workout pack (sweats, shirt, shoes, shampoo, deodorant, and comb). I can fit all of that in this bag plus my light fall jacket, and a 2 inch thick heavy calculus book. This bag can fit it all. Seems like quality material and hasn't ripped or had any problems in the 2mo I've had it
customer_reviews.author: Connie S.

customer_reviews.title: 4 years of use and still good
customer_reviews.text: I have used this backpack 5 days a week for the last 4 years for my 17 inch laptop, for work. I don't plan to replace it anytime soon. It has held up pretty well and has plenty of compartments for my everyday carry items.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Durable Enough, But Lacking Space
customer_reviews.text: It's a durable enough backpack, and I use it for occasional weekend trips but I prefer a little more compartment space in my backpacks. The additional pockets and compartments on this are also surprisingly shallow.
customer_reviews.author: Adroa

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this bag to carry his belongings for softball practice, which he attends twice per week. He thinks it is perfect! It is large enough for his softball glove, batting gloves, small towel, and whatever else he thinks he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he loved my Dakine I bought over 5 years ago. The backpacks by Dakine hold up really well and very easy to wear. I like the neutral look for this one. It's very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Versatile  and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this! He actually used it for a little while as a diaper bag for our son. Very versatile and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Maria Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Good capacity without looking massive!
customer_reviews.text: Finalllly a backpack that holds all of my nursing school stuff! It’s super durable and comfortable to wear. Lots of little compartments for all my little extras too.
customer_reviews.author: Lfox1982

customer_reviews.title: Unless you're tall and holding a lot of stuff, get the 25L
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Disney trip thinking between the diapers, wipes, snacks, hats, sunscreen, etc I would need the large (33L) size. I would have been just fine with the 25L. The 33L was very big. Was very durable and loved the straps on it though.
customer_reviews.author: AmazMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for books
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a back to haul ALL of his book to and from school everyday, these have lasted the whole year with no signs of stress.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this backpack so much! I searched ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this backpack so much! I searched high and low for the biggest and sturdiest backback I could find as school these days basically requires you to carry around everything but the kitchen sink. He can even fit his gym/practice clothes in there also. Not enough room for shoes. Has an insulated section and also padded part for his school iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Eddy

customer_reviews.title: This makes it easy for the compartment to open out like a flap
customer_reviews.text: Beware - the zippers on the front are a bit inconvenient, because they open and close from the bottom. This makes it easy for the compartment to open out like a flap, and make everything fall. Also, there is little to no cushion if you're carrying anything fragile like a laptop. It will provide no protection against drops.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Material is Really Good and pockets are practically useful
customer_reviews.text: Material is Really Good and pockets are practically useful..the only problem i see since i use macbook air which is very thin and this bag does not have laptop pocket lock which makes my Macbook air to come out...if you have thick Laptop then everything is perfect...After use of 4 months my Main Compartment Zip is fail now i dont know how to fix or claim Warranty...No one is taking responsibility worst bag company to buy
customer_reviews.author: Sagee

customer_reviews.title: DAKINE quality not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I love the brand, but the back pack quality has diminished. The zipper quality and bag material are of a lesser quality than my previous Dakine pack. Bummed
customer_reviews.author: DR2

customer_reviews.title: Quality backpack for work stuff
customer_reviews.text: Size 25L. A great bag. Quality zippers and material. Comfortable shoulder straps, adjustability. Fits my Sony WH1000XM2 headphones case in the front-most pocket perfectly. Fits my Dell work laptop with 15.6" screen; a bit snug in the laptop pocket, but zips up completely and without stretching the zipper or materials.
customer_reviews.author: B. Vaillancourt

customer_reviews.title: Very large and stylish bag
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was just what I needed. It was large enough for my school stuff and long enough for my laptop. The insulated cooler was a little thin, but it's hard to find a bag that has that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Stash Bros Builds

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dakine backpack (the other was a hand-me-down that lasted for years before it finally died). I absolutely love their backpacks. They have plenty of compartments (my favorites are the snack & laptop ones) and plenty of space. They’re durable and come in calm colors. No doubt I’ll be back if I need another.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased a lot of Dakine Products and this ain't it.
customer_reviews.text: The texture as awful and it feels incredibly cheap compared to other backpacks they make.
customer_reviews.author: Riverside

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, roomy backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy backpack with plenty of room. My son is using it for his second year in a row and it is still in great shape. He fills it to the brim with books and his chrome book and carry’s it everyday and the straps are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Cwacker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack! It can fit an incredible amount of stuff inside (including my 17" laptop) and all of the specialized pockets are so useful! I'm 5'3" (almost) and in general, backpacks with a large capacity give me the "turtle" look. This one does not! Such a great purchase; I'm very happy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. High quality
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. High quality. Ample storage. Comfortable to carry. I had a similar backpack for 6 years, but decided I wanted a different color and so I got this one. I think I will always use Dakine backpacks based on how much I like the two I have had.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: great pack for a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It's big and it carries all his giant books for college and it's comfortable and it's well made. It's very well organized and the straps are comfortable even under load. The Bozeman is also a really nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Cook

customer_reviews.title: Super spacious, and perfect for school
customer_reviews.text: This is my mom’s amazon account but I’m in college and this is perfect for me. It fits everything I need to get through the day and it adjusts really well to my back. The colors are true to the picture. This is my third dakine backpack since like 8th grade. I love them so much and they last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack and durable 🎒
customer_reviews.text: It’s been great! They’re items are as described. Durable and nice looking. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Alden Heath

customer_reviews.title: It works well for carrying workout clothes and lunch to ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well for carrying workout clothes and lunch to work. I only wish that the cooler compartment was a tad bigger so I could use a more substantial blue ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I've been using a Dakine backpack for years
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I've been using a Dakine backpack for years, and bought this one for a close friend. He carries large engineering textbooks and a 13" MacBook in it with no problem. Lots of extra pockets make it fabulous for when you're stuck on campus or around town all day. Color is very gender neutral and looks professional enough for adults to use.
customer_reviews.author: hdj

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient pockets, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my backpack. So many pockets and compartments. My favorite are the sunglass pocket and the cooler pocket that’s like a lunch bag in the backpack! The color and design is also great. I love the tropical vibe. Overall, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend not using that
customer_reviews.text: I've giving this three stars because the moment I got it, the sunglass zipper got stuck because of the fleece lining. I had to exchange it for another one. I would recommend not using that pocket
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. I use it to carry a large load of textbooks as a full-time student and it still looks new after a few months of heavy use.Especially like the insulated pocket for snacks/lunch. The design is nice for an adult student. I bought a second one for my boyfriend to use for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this backpack- it is a huge upgrade from my old college backpack and the front cooler is great for sunscreen or a toddler snack!
customer_reviews.author: NorwegianwoodBlog

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool, but poor quality. The chest strap broke the first day with a very light load. My kiddo is bummed out. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Durable and lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack!! So many pockets and I travel a lot and it has held up beautifully. It comfortably fits my MacBook Air 13 inch and my 13 inch HP I use for work. Again I love all the pockets it has!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Son and he loves it! Just what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: K. Adkisson

customer_reviews.title: Great bookbag.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his backpack. He has no locker at school and has to carry everything in a backpack. Good thing he doesn’t have a ton of books as everything is done on a MacBook. My older son has had this same but different bag for a year now and it’s held up and carries everything he needs.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack. I’ve had one for years previously and decided it was time to purchase a new one. I ordered the saltwater 33l. The color is a bit darker than pictured, more of a hunter green. Which is why I put only 4 stars. But I still like it. Overall it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Im only 5' 3" and pretty petite. Lived in Hawaii for a decade so ...
customer_reviews.text: Im only 5' 3" and pretty petite. Lived in Hawaii for a decade so a big fan of Dakine namebrand. This backpack is perfect size for me and fits my back well. I got the smaller size because only wanted it big enough to fit one or two college books and my binder. The insulated area is only big enough for maybe a grocery size single serving of sushi? So dont buy it for that reason, other than that, its perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: George D Foote

customer_reviews.title: hello!
customer_reviews.text: everyone has one in hawaii. Now I know why!! Because you need one!! its great for school, for play, beach, exploring, hiking, biking! just everything! all purpose bag for the adventurous active life!
customer_reviews.author: DLynn

customer_reviews.title: Best Product buy So far on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Dakine is always great quality! Works well for my College books and work. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Andreena

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and well made. WORTH THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: Roomy and well made. This is the third backpack, and 5th Dakine product I have purchased. This one was for my brother for a birthday gift for college. He loves it. Purchased it with a matching pen/pencil container.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: The second backpack I've purchased from DaKine. This one can hold a lot of heavy stuff and is made of durable material. My husband also uses it for camping and hiking. He pretty much takes it wherever he goes.
customer_reviews.author: Volcanomama

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son in high school. Really happy with the product, especially the insulated pocket! Keeps his sandwich nice and chilled until he's ready to eat it. The height of the backpack is perfect to fit his gym shorts in above his books, and also tall enough to fit his drum sticks and still close the zipper completely. The straps are a nice width and very sturdy. Definitely recommend getting a Dakine backpack, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: patricia m dudoit

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT, LOVE THE FOOD POCKET
customer_reviews.text: Love DAKINE bags, this is no exception. TONS of space, great for a overnighter, a day hike, or trekking to school. LOVE the insulated front pocket, it has enough room for an ice pack, sandwich, fruit and bag of chips.
customer_reviews.author: PawsDog

customer_reviews.title: Get one with a working zipper.
customer_reviews.text: The outside pocket zipper broke shortly after we bought it but too long after the return date. Figures.
customer_reviews.author: Riitta K

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DIAPER BAG
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Using it for a diaper bag instead of a big bulky one. Side pockets fit wipes perfectly and I use the front "cooler" section for diapers. Great Bag at a great price with fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Zucflylady

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! It is everything I always wanted in a Backpack! Treats me very good, holds all the items needed plus some! Love the side pockets and the cooler!!! One of Dakine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the previous Dakines, this updated one is very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag ... made of nice materials. It's actually a nice size with with accommodate holding my mac book pro and college textbooks with no problems. The cam pattern looks good and the shoulder straps seem pretty durable. (2 years of college and still awesome shape)
customer_reviews.author: N.Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great styling. Lots of pockets for the things I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great styling. Lots of pockets for the things I use. The only improvement I would like to see is a strap or tighter laptop sleeve. I have a 15" MacBook Pro and it is very loose inside the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: As expected top quality from Dakine
customer_reviews.text: Ride a motorcycle, excellent for my extras I like to carry.
customer_reviews.author: dayno1220

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoulder straps and padded back
customer_reviews.text: My little brother really likes this backpack. Got it for his birthday just before school started. Comfortable shoulder straps and padded back. Multiple compartments, even has a side to secure a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and everything about it
customer_reviews.text: This has endured a lot and still holding strong. I love the color and everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great pack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack and I got it for a good price. I will say that the laptop sleeve is bigger than the reviews I read said. My 15.6 inch laptop fit in without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully this will stand through college...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this backpack. It is well-made, sturdy and looks good. I drink a lot of water and the backpack holds my Nalgene bottle nicely. I must mention though that the backpack is HUGE (no complaints, the bigger the better to me) and sometimes some stuff gets lost all the way in the bottom so I have to dig it out. I feel like adding another compartment would solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: milachka

customer_reviews.title: I use this bag daily for school and love it. Heavy duty canvas so I don't worry ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag daily for school and love it. Heavy duty canvas so I don't worry about it ripping. I can fit about 4" of books in the laptop sleeve which protects them.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: pockets are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this backpack, however, the pockets are deceiving. They're small. The very front pocket is insulated... kinda cool. The two right behind it a really shallow. I thought I'd be able to fit pencil case/journals in them, but I can just barely fit my glasses case. The main compartment is fine. I like the sleeve for my laptop and all. Overall, I'm ok with this product. I just wish the front pockets were deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Lucid

customer_reviews.title: I actually love the backpack
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the backpack. My only complaint is the sticker on the denim fabric. The sticker is easy to remove but the glue remains will damage the fabric and will stay there forever (in my case after trying many ways to remove the glue).
customer_reviews.author: Lian

customer_reviews.title: Inside is very nice, not made from that outside material
customer_reviews.text: Not wild about mfg choice of backpack material. It reminds me of products that use to crack in cold weather. Have not field tested it yet, but hanging on to my "Lifetime "guarantee . Inside is very nice, not made from that outside material.
customer_reviews.author: David F.Ewart

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice good-quality backpack. Arrived within two days, and was fresh and new. One downside, the pattern in the picture that I looked at is a tad different than the bag I got... Same pattern, but the flowers and leaves were places differently leaving the front panel a bit boring. But very sturdy and very large to fit all of your school/hiking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeshika

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. A bit big for our kindergarten student
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. A bit big for our kindergarten student, but the size his school asks for (to hold full size binders/folders). I have been a dakine fan for 20+ years due to quality and this is probably the easiest way to get them via Amazon. We currently have 4 different ones being used by different family members in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer J. Chun

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect to carry everything so that my hands are free!
customer_reviews.text: So far the back pack and all it's pockets are working for me. In particular the sunglasses pocket at the top is a great location and the water bottle pockets are nice and wide which allows me to carry my thermal cup easily on one side. The main section can carry an extra set of clothes and shoes which is a bonus if I'm going out after work. Fantastic bag!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Scott

customer_reviews.title: Too large for a university student but great for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and it's functionality but I gave it to my husband because the 33-L was just too large for what I needed. Ordered the 26-L instead. I am at university so carry a laptop, binder, pens/etc, wallet, and notebook. Good construction and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Small size, pretty designs
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bag for a high schooler. I never use notebooks anymore, so I found it strange that people had these huge hiking-north face bags, and jansports. I found the perfect size for me with the prettiest design ever!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight bag
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight backpack but large enough for everything you will need. I am in college for neuroscience so I often live on campus and this lightweight backpack is a back saver and has room for everything I need including a compartment to keep my laptop safe and an attached cooler to keep my lunch cold. Perfect for college students.
customer_reviews.author: LLWood

customer_reviews.title: Solid backpack
customer_reviews.text: I had a Dakine backpack for 5 years before I decided I needed a new one; this one works better than the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backpack
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this backpack, I was looking for another brand before but I keep this brand and I will buy another backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Good pack, but only one workable storage area.
customer_reviews.text: The pack is comfortable and well-designed. The chest strap is an unneeded/unremovable accessory. Also be advised, there is only one large compartment with a separate for a laptop. The others are very small, good enough for eyeglasses, phones, keys, etc., but none of any size to put an item like a book or newspaper in. However all in all, I'm satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Philo

customer_reviews.title: strap not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: seems like a sturdy backpack but I don't like the extra fabric across the top, distorts the fit of the straps a bit heavy as well
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Fendt

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is made well. It has lots of room and my son loved it for school.
customer_reviews.author: myel

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I dislike about this backpack is that I wish the middle ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I dislike about this backpack is that I wish the middle pocket was slightly larger. The back pocket is great, plenty of room. Some things I just want to keep separated and I have to cram them into the middle pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack Ever
customer_reviews.text: I brought this backpack for my 5 year old son and it's the best. Great size for everything he needs to take with him everyday. The small cooler in the front works great.
customer_reviews.author: marisa

product_meta.title: Dakine Campus LIfestyle Backpack – 25L & 33L Size Options
product_meta.description:
The tried-and-true Campus backpack gets a passing grade as the ultimate back-to-school backpack. This roomy backpack features four distinct compartments including a large top compartment with a padded laptop sleeve and room for books and binders. It also includes an insulated cooler pocket to keep lunch and snacks cool. The Campus features a roomy main compartment with a secure laptop sleeve, an organizer pocket, a fleece-line sunglass pocket, plus a low-profile front zippered pocket and dual mesh side pockets for water bottles. Padded shoulder straps and an adjustable sternum strap ensure a perfect fit. Available in twelve unique prints and colors to match your unique style. Limited lifetime warranty included.

Care Instructions:
Adventures are messy. If your Dakine bag gets dirty, we recommend hand washing with mild soap (like Nikwax Tech Wash), cold water and a soft bristle brush. If hand washing is not going to do the trick, use a front loader washing machine. To ensure your backpack doesn't get tangled, place inside a pillowcase or mesh bag before washing. Always use cold water, mild soap and run on a gentle cycle. Never bleach your pack. Hang to dry in a warm but shady place, ensuring both inside and out are dry before storing.
feature_bullets: PERFECT BACK-TO-SCHOOL BACKPACK: The Dakine Campus backpack is the perfect back-to-school backpack. With multiple pockets and ample storage space, this backpack is optimal for students of any educational level.

PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE: The modern student often has a laptop or tablet to use in school. The 25L & 33L Campus Backpack, comes with a separated padded laptop sleeve to keep your 14 (25L) and 15" (33L) laptop protected from damage.
INSULATED COOLER POCKET: The Campus Backpack comes with an insulated cooler pocket, perfect for storing lunches, drinks, and snacks to keep them cool for hours.
ADJUSTABLE STERNUM STRAP: Dakine's Campus Backpacks are comfortable and easy to carry. Padded shoulder straps and an adjustable sternum strap allow you to customize the backpack to fit your needs.
MESH SIDE POCKETS: Two mesh side pockets on both sides of the backpack allow you to store water bottles or a cell phone for quick access.
Insulated cooler pocket; Volume2000 cu. in. [ 33 L ]Size20 x 13 x 9" [ 51 x 33 x 23cm ]
